thread.title: Jacqui May
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Jacqui May

author: Jacqui May
title: Jacqui May
text: This is the first time I have used this service. They turned up in the allotted time to collect my car, a very nice polite young lady. They called me to let me know what needed doing which was nothing more than an oil change and brake fluid change. The person who called, Gary, was very polite and courteous, a pleasure to talk to. They did not try to tell me anything else needed doing so was happy with the final bill, within my expectations. The car was delivered back within the allotted time by the same very nice polite young lady. I would use their service again and recommend them to others.
